        public static void fillFrame​(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
        Fills a JFrame with the details of the application.
        Parameters:

      • runDrones

        public static void runDrones()
        Runs the selected traversal algorithms.

      • getNewArea

        public static Area getNewArea()
        Gives a new area based on the current options. If the area is random, a totally new random area is generated; if it is from a file, only the distribution of objects will change.
        Returns:
        A new area based on the current options.

      • remakeDronePanel

        public static javax.swing.JPanel remakeDronePanel()
        Recreates the drone panel to include options for each member of the drone team.
        Returns:
        A JPanel allowing the user to select some options about drones.

      • getNewDroneTeam

        public static DroneTeam getNewDroneTeam()
        Generates a DroneTeam from the current options for number and type of drones.
        Returns:
        A DroneTeam based on the current options.

      • getAllowedDroneSet

        public static Drone[] getAllowedDroneSet​(int id)
        Gives an array of new Drones (all of the same ID) of various types from which the user can select.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the new drones.
        Returns:
        An array of various Drones with that ID.

      • guiToArea

        public static Point guiToArea​(int guiX,
                              int guiY)
        Scales a point on the coverage panel to its equivalent point in the currently active area.
        Parameters:
        guiX - X location of the point within the coverage panel.
        guiY - Y location of the point within the coverage panel.
        Returns:
        A point scaled to the units of the area that the coverage panel shows.
